metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39948 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Servicestandard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.10.0 and2.6.5, the `BadParamException` thrown by Fast CDR is not caught in FastDDS. This can remotely crash any Fast DDS process. Versions 2.10.0 and2.6.5 contain a patch for this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
libfastrtps2.5 - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fastdds package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
